message: Welcome to our store! I'm excited to offer you a high-quality product today. With its superior craftsmanship and durability, it's designed to exceed your expectations. Invest in something that will provide value and satisfaction for years to come. Don't miss out on this opportunity to enhance your experience with our premium item at an unbeatable price of $100.
I'd like to take a chance on the product, but I'd like to clarify that I'll only buy it if it's high-quality. If it's low-quality, I'll pass.

This time, we've got a special deal for you - a low-quality product at a discounted price of $100. Please note, while it may not meet our usual high standards, it still offers some utility. Are you willing to take a risk for a potentially valuable learning experience?
